list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: chore: disable saucelabs-tests since the tunnel is not working

list.name: chore: update components/handlebars package.json on release
list.comment:
chore: auto-update package.json for components/handlebars.js when releasing
- see components/handlebars.js#23 for details

list.name: Revert "Escape = in HTML content"
list.comment:
Revert "Escape = in HTML content"
This reverts commit 1c863e34, a change that was illegal in a patch (by semver semantics).
see #1489

list.name: Revert "fix: gracefully handle read-only "column"-property of the Error class"
list.comment:
Revert "fix: gracefully handle read-only "column"-property of the Error class"
This reverts commit 725986da

task.summary: - do not test with safari 10 (tests are failing)
- do not test with safari 9 (tests are failing), add firefox

fix: gracefully handle read-only "column"-property of the Error class
- this is the case in Safari starting with version 9.0 - see 07511e0379dbdeea78f407065b0a3134a79a38a6
chore: update components/handlebars package.json on release

chore: add publishConfig to prevent publishing 3.x as "latest"
see #1486

chore: fix package.json of components/handlebars.js repo
- a "name" is required

fix: disallow the use of constructors in templates
This closes a major security leak that allows execution of arbitrary code in a NodeJS environment by creating a special Handlebars template.
test: run appveyor tests in Node 10

fix: disallow access to the constructor in templates to prevent RCE
This commit fixes a Remote Code Execution (RCE) reported by npm-security. Access to non-enumerable "constructor"-properties is now prohibited by the compiled template-code, because this the first step on the way to creating and execution arbitrary JavaScript code. The vulnerability affects systems where an attacker is allowed to inject templates into the Handlebars setup. Further details of the attack may be disclosed by npm-security.
Closes #1267 Closes #1495
test: run appveyor tests in Node 10
chore: make sure that 4.0.x does not get "latest"-tag on npm

chore: Use node 10 to build handlebars
Node 10 is LTS now...
(cherry picked from commit 78dd89c13aa26c82bf73d27b2e29f1c01283d7a4)
add test counter for measuring time
test: make security testcase ie10 compatible

test: make security testcase internet explorer compatible
Internet Explorer does not support the 'class Testclass {}' notation, and tests are not compiled using babel.
closes #1497

chore: update grunt-saucelabs and aws dependency
- hopefully fixing hanging saucelabs build
chore: disable saucelabs-tests since the tunnel is not working

MESSAGE.value:
fix: disallow access to the constructor in templates to prevent RCE
This commit fixes a Remote Code Execution (RCE) reported by npm-security. Access to non-enumerable "constructor"-properties is now prohibited by the compiled template-code, because this the first step on the way to creating and execution arbitrary JavaScript code. The vulnerability affects systems where an attacker is allowed to inject templates into the Handlebars setup. Further details of the attack may be disclosed by npm-security.
Closes #1267 Closes #1495
test: run appveyor tests in Node 10
chore: make sure that 4.0.x does not get "latest"-tag on npm

chore: Use node 10 to build handlebars
Node 10 is LTS now...
(cherry picked from commit 78dd89c13aa26c82bf73d27b2e29f1c01283d7a4)

test: add test for NodeJS compatibility
The test is a simple addition to the existing tests. It should ensure that the built Handlebars artifact only uses language features that are available in old versions of NodeJS. A simple program and the precompiler are started with NodeJS 0.10 to 11
add test counter for measuring time
test: make security testcase ie10 compatible

test: make security testcase internet explorer compatible
Internet Explorer does not support the 'class Testclass {}' notation, and tests are not compiled using babel.
closes #1497

fix: prevent RCE through the "lookup"-helper
- The "lookup" helper could also be used to run a remote code execution by manipulating the template. The same check as for regular path queries now also is done in the "lookup"-helper

chore: update grunt-saucelabs and aws dependency
- hopefully fixing hanging saucelabs build
chore: disable saucelabs-tests since the tunnel is not working

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: chore: disable saucelabs-tests since the tunnel is not working
